/mnt/cidstore1/physics/dshen/tools/openmpi-intel/bin/mpifort -O2 -assume byterecl CMakeFiles/combine_hotstart7.dir/combine_hotstart7.f90.o -o ../../bin/combine_hotstart7  -Wl,-rpath,/mnt/cidstore1/physics/dshen/tools/netcdf-intel/lib ../../lib/libutillib.a /mnt/cidstore1/physics/dshen/tools/netcdf-intel/lib/libnetcdf.so /mnt/cidstore1/physics/dshen/tools/netcdf-intel/lib/libnetcdff.so
